title: Reports of putting Shahbaz Sharif’s name of ECL on Eid day not correct: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 13 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Thursday that reports of putting Shahbaz Sharif’s name on Exit Contol List
( ECL) on Eid day were not correct.
In a tweet, he said no such notification has been issued yet.
However, the Cabinet Committee has recommended that Shahbaz Sharif’s name should be included in the ECL and it will be implemented as per normal procedure, the minister remarked.
عید کے روز شہباز شریف کا نام ECLپر ڈالنے کی اطلاعات درست نہیں ہیں، ابھی تک ایسا کوئ نوٹیفیکشن نہیں ہوا ، البتہ کابینہ کمیٹی نے شہباز شریف کا نام ECL میں ڈالنے کی سفارش کی ہے اور اس پر معمول کے طریقہ کار کے مطابق عمدرآمد ہو گا https://t.co/xTQTlZuaaw
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) May 13, 2021
